xtc.lang.cpp
Interface Actions.Context

Enclosing class:
Actions
public static interface Actions.Context

The context interface.

Method Summary

          Fork this context.

Method Detail

fork

Actions.Context fork()
Fork this context. This method is invoked on regular fork operations but not on fork operations due to context.

Returns:
The forked context.

shouldFork

boolean shouldFork(ForkMergeParser.Subparser parser)
Determine whether the parser needs to be forked due to context. This method is invoked when shifting a token on the context's subparser.

Parameters:
parser - The subparser.
Returns:
true if the parser needs to be forked due to context.

fork

ForkMergeParser.Subparser fork(ForkMergeParser.Subparser parser)
Fork a subparser due to context. This method needs to fork the subparser and update both original and copy to reflect the contextual ambiguity.

Parameters:
parser - The subparser.
Returns:
The forked subparser.

mayMerge

boolean mayMerge(Actions.Context other)
Determine whether this context can merge with another. This method is invoked on merge candidates that already observe the merge discipline (modulo context).

Parameters:
other - The other context.
Returns:
true if the contexts may merge.

merge

Actions.Context merge(Actions.Context other)
Merge this context with another.

Parameters:
other - The other context.
Returns:
The merged context.
